services.title: Custom Website Development
services.description: Design and develop responsive and visually appealing websites tailored to your needs. Ideal for small businesses, personal projects, or blogs, with clean code and basic SEO integration.

services.title: React.js Web Application Development
services.description: Build simple yet efficient web applications using React.js. Perfect for projects requiring interactive and dynamic user interfaces with reusable components and smooth navigation.

services.title: Website Redesign & Optimization
services.description: Enhance your existing website with a fresh, modern design. Services include improving page speed, optimizing for mobile devices, and ensuring better usability.

services.title: E-commerce Website Development
services.description: Create basic e-commerce platforms with essential features like product catalogs, shopping carts, and payment gateways. Great for small businesses looking to establish an online presence.

services.title: Website Maintenance & Bug Fixes
services.description: Ensure your website stays functional and up-to-date with regular maintenance. Includes fixing bugs, updating plugins, and making minor content changes.

services.title: Single Page Application (SPA) Development
services.description: Develop lightweight and responsive Single Page Applications (SPAs) using React.js for projects like portfolios or small business websites with seamless user experience.

services.title: Landing Page Design
services.description: Design professional and conversion-focused landing pages for marketing campaigns or product promotions. Includes custom design and responsive layouts.

services.title: Portfolio Website Creation
services.description: Showcase your work and achievements with a simple, elegant portfolio website. Ideal for freelancers, artists, or professionals looking to build an online presence.

services.title: Website Migration
services.description: Safely transfer your website to a new hosting provider or platform. This includes basic testing and troubleshooting to ensure smooth functionality.

services.title: Freelance Consulting for Beginners
services.description: Offer advice and assistance for basic web development projects, including guidance on setting up a website, selecting tools, and implementing basic features.
